subject: Attn Beneficiary,
body:
Attn Beneficiary,
Hello good day. This is Mrs Judith GBEHINTO; I am writing to inform
you that we have received Compensation funds of $1,700,000  from
United Nations  Commission (UNCC) that you will receive through our
Western Union or ATM card Department.  but the maximum amount you will
be receiving every day  is $5000.00 as  reflected in our transfer
system daily until the funds is completely transferred. meanwhile the
below is the first US$5000.00 payment information available for pick
up .
Here is the western union information to pick up the US$5000.00;
Here is the Senders Information;
SENDERS NAME: Roy Heath
Text question: God?
Text answer: Good.
MTCN: 3358547826 .(Available for pick up by receiver)
Please,contact Mr Gbenga Makinde if there is any problem with the MTCN
reply to him through this email address (
uwoffie@yahoo.com
)  Please
contact him now, so that he will send you another one today if You
have a problem with the MTCN or the sender Name try to reach her on
call or email him so that he will correct it for you.I told him to
keep sending you $5000.00 daily until the payment of $1,700,000 is
completed. 
Do not forget to furnish him with the below information;
1) Full Name: ........
2) Full Address:.........
3) Nationality: .............
4) Your contact number: .................
5) 
I'd Card
.................
Contact  Name: Mr Gbenga Makinde
Newly appointed manager
Whats App Number: +229-647-02188
Thank you and stay blessed.
Yours sincerely
Mrs Judith GBEHINTO

subject: Re: Attn Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Mrs. Judith GBEHINTO,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided regarding the funds from the United Nations Commission UNCC. It sounds like a great opportunity, but I have a few questions before proceeding.

Could you please clarify how the funds will be transferred? You mentioned Western Union or an ATM card. Which option would be more suitable for me?

Also, I noticed that you mentioned a maximum amount that can be received daily. Could you please explain why there is a limit and how long it will take to receive the complete funds?

Lastly, I would like to know more about Mr. Gbenga Makinde, the sender of the funds. Is he affiliated with the United Nations Commission UNCC? How can I contact him if there are any issues with the MTCN or sender name?

I look forward to your response and thank you for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Pauline

subject: Re:  Attention Pauline,
body:
Attention Pauline, 
sorry for my late reply due am out of office for some weeks now, however the please option to suitable for is ATM card because you can use the ATM card to make any amount of withdraw as much as you like per day, Therefore kindly provide your full details for process of your funds payment, 


1) Full Name: ........
2) Full Address:.........
3) Nationality: .............
4) Your contact number: .................
5) I'd Card.................

Mr Gbenga Makinde
Newly appointed manager
Whats App Number: +229-647-02188

subject: Re:  Attention Pauline,
body:
Hello Mr. Gbenga Makinde,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your response and understanding regarding my delayed reply. I hope you are doing well.

I understand that the ATM card option allows for convenient withdrawals, which sounds quite useful. However, before I provide any personal information, could you please clarify a few things for me?

1. Which organization or company do you represent?
2. What is the purpose of this funds payment?
3. Are there any fees or charges associated with obtaining the ATM card?

Once I have a better understanding of these details, I will be able to proceed accordingly.

Best wishes,
Pauline

body:

subject: Re:  From Mr Gbenga Makinde Newly appointed manager
body:
Hello Mr. Gbenga Makinde,
Thank you for your message. I'm interested in receiving the ATM card. Could you please provide more details about the process and the fee involved? How secure is this method of transfer?

Best wishes,
Pauline
